text: Just try to make 1 of your portfolio daily. That's all you're supposed to target. I cannot tell you how many times I've seen different social media figures throwing out these completely bullshit numbers like that that are absolutely ridiculous. The annualized return on 1 per day is 1,127 return. How probable or possible do you think that is? Then probably not very. So it's important to just run information you hear through the most basic of bullshit detectors. And if something sounds too good to be true, guess what? It probably is being an aller-sealiter.
